name: cobracom
story:
Not be confused with the 1984 Data East game of the same name, which was a LaserDisc game. Cobra-Command is a 1988 arcade game developed and published by Data East that was later ported to the NES. It is a side-scroller in which the player flies a heavily armored helicopter through six stages to destroy enemy tanks, cannons, submarines, and gunboats.

There are missions to Sumatra, Java, Borneo, the South China Sea, Siam and the enemy's headquarters.
